item.title: Exercises
item.description: Pod Deployment with health checks, PersistentVolume and claim, Since we have created the mysql pod several times, here is a yaml file that creates it all. Create a secret for the password between Wordpress and MYSQL kubectl create secret generic mysql-pass --from-literal=password=YOUR_PASSWORD Verify it is there kubectl get secrets Deploy mysql kubectl apply -f mysql-all.yaml Verify mysql deployed properly kubectl get deploy Services Deploy the service for mysql
